languages.text: Wide-cone flamer attack that additionally sets its targets and owner on fire, applying {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

languages.text: 大范围扇形火焰攻击，会让所有目标与装备者着火，施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}（10）效果。
languages.original_text: Wide-cone flamer attack that additionally sets its targets and owner on fire, applying {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text: 大范围扇形火焰攻击，会让所有目标与装备者着火，获得燃烧（10）效果。

languages.text: Атака из огнемета по области в виде широкого конуса, также накладывающая {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горение{/g} (10) на все цели и на само существо.
languages.original_text: Wide-cone flamer attack that additionally sets its targets and owner on fire, applying {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text: Атака из огнемета по области в виде широкого конуса, также накладывающая горение (10) на все цели и на само существо.
Атака из огнемета по области в виде широкого конуса, также накладывающая горение (10) на все цели и на само существо.

languages.text: さらにターゲットと所有者を燃え上げ、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}(10)を与える広い錐状のフレイマー攻撃。
languages.original_text: Wide-cone flamer attack that additionally sets its targets and owner on fire, applying {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text: ターゲットと所有者をさらに燃え上がらせ、炎上(10)を与える広い錐状のフレイマー攻撃。

languages.text: Lanzallamas de amplio abanico que además prende fuego a los objetivos y al portador, infligiendo {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} (10).
languages.original_text: Wide-cone flamer attack that additionally sets its targets and owner on fire, applying {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

languages.text: Flammenwerferangriff mit weitem Kegel, der seine Ziele und seinen Besitzer in Brand setzt und {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g} (10) verursacht.
languages.original_text: Wide-cone flamer attack that additionally sets its targets and owner on fire, applying {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text: Flammenwerferangriff mit weitem Kegel, der seine Ziele und seinen Besitzer außerdem in Brand setzt und Verbrennen (10) verursacht.

languages.text: Large attaque conique au lance-flammes qui embrase ses cibles et son propriétaire, en leur appliquant l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} (10).
languages.original_text: Wide-cone flamer attack that additionally sets its targets and owner on fire, applying {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} (10).

traits.locale_text: Large attaque conique au lance-flammes qui enflamme ses cibles et son propriétaire, en leur appliquant l'effet Combustion (10).

languages.text: Konik biçimli geniş bir alanı etkileyen alevsaçan saldırısı. Ayrıca hem hedeflerde hem de silahın sahibinde {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g} (10) etkisi oluşturur.
